data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 24,383 believers in the state of Sai Kung the wisdom of how to form simple, reproducible churches of 12-30 in every neighborhood.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Sai Kung, Hong Kong
data.section_summary: What beauty can God be thanked for in this photo?

data.prayer: Jesus, you taught Paul to train Timothy to train faithful men who would train others. Please, teach the church of Sai Kung, Hong Kong to do the same.
data.verse: And the things you have heard me say in the presence of many witnesses entrust to reliable people who will also be qualified to teach others.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 16 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, we know that cultures come and go, even in the state of Sai Kung, but the truth of your Word endures generations.
data.verse: Your Word, Lord, is eternal; it stands firm in the heavens.

data.prayer: Spirit, please defend the 24,383 believers in Sai Kung against an unwillingness to suffer. Give them courage to face social rejection.
Father, encourage the 24,383 believers in Sai Kung to not just be consumers of knowledge but be producers of love, mercy, kindness, and justice.
data.verse: let us not love with words or speech but with actions and in truth.

data.prayer: Jesus, protect the vulnerable in Sai Kung, Hong Kong from the evil one.
data.verse: My prayer is not that you take them out of the world but that you protect them from the evil one.

data.prayer: Jesus, make yourself known to the 398,400 people living in Sai Kung through the internet today.
data.verse: They have no speech, they use no words; no sound is heard from them. Yet their voice goes out into all the earth, their words to the ends of the world. In the heavens God has pitched a tent for the sun.

data.section_summary:
the state of Sai Kung, Hong Kong has a population of 398,400.

We estimate Sai Kung has 24,383 people who might know Jesus, 27,749 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 346,268 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 16 neighbors who need Jesus.
